name: Bee Zone
overview: In this type-in game that is somewhat like Amidar, you play this little white "man" who has to go around collecting honey inside a beehive. while avoiding the bees that reside inside it, including the queen who constantly lays down new honey whenever she steps onto a space in which you've collected. The goal is to collect all the honey before the queen can lay down more. This game was developed by Kevin Black & Michael Wiens and published in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1987/09 (Issue #51)
